string.name: whats_new_text
string.translation_description: Description of new features in this version in html

resources.string:
Welcome %1$s

New in version %2$s

\t • Added option to reverse the magnetic sensor for the small number of phones (e.g. some OnePlusOnes) that have incorrectly implemented the sensor API
\t • German translation fix
\t • Fixed manual location bugfix (couldn\'t enter negative numbers)
